BackstoryDef.title: MLP Obsessive
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is utterly obsessed with My Little Pony, and has spent most of [PAWN_possessive] adult life watching every episode and movie on repeat, as well as making [PAWN_possessive] own art, fanfiction and plushies.\n\nAs a result, [PAWN_pronoun] is very passionate about making friends and creating things, but is completely incapable of any other skills.
